text: Olivier Giscard d'Estaing (30 December 1927 - 13 September 2021) was a French politician. He was chairman of the Committee for a World Parliament. He was the brother of French President Valéry Giscard d'Estaing. Giscard d'Estaing died in Vierzon, France on 13 September 2021, aged 93.Valéry Giscard d'Estaing : mort de son frère Olivier, la famille face à nouveau deuil ==References== ==Other websites== * World Parliament * INSEAD Business Category:1927 births Category:French mayors Category:2021 deaths Category:Valéry Giscard d'Estaing
title: Olivier Giscard d'Estaing
